text: Adelino Anderson Pestana (born 1 March 1992) is an Angolan handball player for Interclube and the Angolan national team.2019 World Men's Handball Championship roster He participated at the 2017 World Men's Handball Championship.2017 World Championship roster ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Angolan male handball players Category:African Games silver medalists for Angola Category:African Games medalists in handball Category:Competitors at the 2011 All-Africa Games Category:Competitors at the 2015 African Games Category:Competitors at the 2019 African Games
title: Adelino Pestana
